name: Conjoinathan
description:
It's Conjoinathan, everybody's favorite blocky fellow! Conjoinathan isn't just a normal block, however... he has the rare ability to merge together with other blocky fellows to form unique shapes!! (Con)join in on the adventure and platform across 13 unique levels, solving puzzles by absorbing fellow blocks and using your newfound shape to your advantage.

How to do things: [Move with the ARROW KEYS. R to restart level. M to toggle audio levels. F to toggle fullscreen.]

Originally made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam with the theme "joined together." Code & art by Joshua Edwards, and music by Valbun1 [ng].

(yes, the name of this game is a terrible amalgamation of the words "conjoin" and "Jonathan," and no i will not apologize)
